caption.p: mRNA expression levels of methionine metabolism genes in the livers of (A) wild type mice and (B) liver specific Phb1 heterozygous mice fed the normal, choline-deficient diet (SDD), or soy protein diet (SPD). The expression of Mat1a, Gnmt, Sahh, Bhmt, Ms, Cbs, Ggl, Gclc, Gclm, and Gss was determined by quantitative reverse-transcription-polymerase chain reaction. Each bar represents the meanÂ± SEM. Different letters (a,b) indicate significant differences among diets ( P <0.05).
